response.original_title: Thea-Skot Through the Heart and You're to Blame
response.overview: Alison Thea-Skot brings you a sizzling explosion of chaotic character comedy. A high-octane solo sketch show featuring ballads from a lovelorn Oyster Card and the British Passport, Bon Jovi with a particularly phallic hand-puppet and Dame Shirley Bassey in a large 70s paper lampshade. This show is a fabulous, joyful riot that is excellent fun a brilliantly zany hour from a highly-polished talent.
response.title: Thea-Skot Through the Heart and You're to Blame
